email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts and if you’d like to proceed. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. Given the current market conditions, the best I can do is $48.50 per metric ton. As for the laycan, we’re looking at October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Regarding the laycan, October 15-20 works for us. Could you also provide details on the demurrage terms? Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.50 works for you. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with these terms and send it over for your review. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the demurrage terms are acceptable. Please go ahead and send over the charter party agreement. Looking forward to finalizing this. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve just sent over the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if you have any questions or need further adjustments. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best, Sarah.
